mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auction (title, minSalary, maxSalary, occupation, period, education, employmentType, stack, certification, location, portfolio, startDate, endDate, state, startPrice, bidMaxPrice) VALUES (#{title}, #{minSalary}, #{maxSalary}, #{occupation}, #{period}, #{education}, #{employmentType}, #{stack}, #{certification}, #{location}, #{portfolio}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{state}, #{startPrice}, #{bidMaxPrice});
mapper.select: SELECT a.auctionNum, a.title, a.minSalary, a.maxSalary, p.personImage, p.nickName FROM auction a JOIN person p ON a.id = p.id LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
